meanings.definition: To value highly or regard with great esteem.
meanings.sent1: She was prizing the handmade gift from her friend.
meanings.sent2: The team prizing teamwork above all else.
meanings.sent3: The children were prizing their new toys like precious treasures.
meanings.sent4: He prizing honesty as the most important quality in a friend.
meanings.sent5: The artist prizing each brushstroke in her masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To award or obtain a prize.
meanings.sent1: The school prizing the winner of the science fair.
meanings.sent2: She prizing the trophy for her outstanding performance.
meanings.sent3: The cat prizing the mouse as its prize catch.
meanings.sent4: He prizing the rare coin in his collection.
meanings.sent5: The chef prizing the cooking competition trophy.

meanings.definition: The act of valuing or esteeming highly.
meanings.sent1: Her prizing of family bonds was evident in her actions.
meanings.sent2: The prizing of honesty in their community was admirable.
meanings.sent3: The prizing of the antique vase led to a bidding war.
meanings.sent4: His prizing of hard work was instilled in him from a young age.
meanings.sent5: The prizing of education was a core value in their household.
